lessons.japanese: てっきり参加してくれるものだと思ってました。
lessons.english: I took it for granted that you would join us.

lessons.japanese: てっきり僕たちはどこかに行くものだと思っていたよ。
lessons.english: I thought we were going to go somewhere.

lessons.japanese: てっきり僕たちはどこかに行くものだと思っていたよ。
lessons.english: I thought we were going to go somewhere.

lessons.japanese: てっきりずっと日本にいるかと思ったよ。
lessons.english: I thought for sure you would stay in Japan forever.

lessons.japanese: てっきりずっと日本にいるかと思ったよ。
lessons.english: I thought for sure you would stay in Japan forever.

lessons.japanese: てっきり参加してくれるものだと思ってました。
lessons.english: I took it for granted that you would join us.
